snippet: Ms. Taymor contends that the show's producers secretly conspired to oust her while still asking her to make changes on the show's book while public performances were going on.
abstract: Ms. Taymor contends that the show's producers secretly conspired to oust her while still asking her to make changes on the show's book while public performances were going on.

headline.main: In Court Filing, Taymor Says 'Spider-Man' Producers Are Trying to Ruin Her Reputation
headline.print_headline: A Response by Taymor To ‘Spider-Man’ Producers
